name: Seraphim Principia
description:
A big name for a small "infinite stacker" game; Seraphim Principia casts the player as the spirit of Sir Isaac Newton himself, idling away his eternity by building towers using the laws of physics he famously observed in life. Drop heavenly objects from the sky and stack your way up as high as possible.

Controls:

  • Spacebar: drop objects

Credits:

SERAPHIM PRINCIPIA

Released: 9/25/2022
